documentation:
Selects documents in a collection and returns a cursor to the selected documents 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors)

Sets the minimum context access level the caller needs to return results 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.access-level)

detail: batchSize(sz) sz The internal cursor batch size (between 1 and 1000)
documentation:
Sets the internal cursor batch size for fetching results 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.batchsize-sz)

Releases the cursor resources 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.close)

Executes a count using the current match filter and cursor options 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.count)

detail: expand(...props) props - Property paths to expand
documentation:
Sets the references that should be expanded in the returned documents 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.expand-...props)

detail: forEach(fn) fn - a function to call for each element in the form of (document) => {}
documentation:
Executes the cursor, calling fn with each document. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.foreach-fn)

Sets the property grant level for the operation. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.grant-level-null)

Executes the cursor, returning true if next() can be safely called to fetch the next result. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.hasnext)

detail: include(...props) props - Property paths to include (e.g. include('connections'))
documentation:
Sets the optional properties to include in results. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.include-...props)

Returns true if a cursor has been opened and has been subsequently closed or exhausted. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.isclosed)

Limits the number of query results to count. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.limit-count)

Specifies the locale of the cursor for any localized strings. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.locale-identifier)

detail: map(fn) fn - a function to call for each result
documentation:
Exhausts the cursor, calling fn with each document, and returning an array of results. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.map-fn)

detail: maxTimeMs(ms) ms - A number between 10 and 10000.
documentation:
Set the maximum time a query is allowed to run. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.maxtimems-ms)

Returns the next result. Throws a RangeError is there are no more results. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.next)

Opens a cursor (without fetching any results) which can be returned from a route script and streamed directly through the api. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.passthru)

detail: pathPrefix(path) path - Path to a list property.
documentation:
Sets the query prefix for retrieving a nested List property. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.pathprefix-path-null)

detail: pathRead(path, options) path - Property path to read, options - Object
documentation:
Returns the first matching document single path base on the current cursor options. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.pathread-path-options)

detail: paths(...props) props - Property paths to return in results.
documentation:
Limits the result properties to ...props. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.paths-...props)

detail: reduce(fn, memo) fn - a function to call for each result, memo - an initial value for fn
documentation:
Exhausts the cursor, calling fn with memo for each document, and returning memo. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.reduce-fn-memo)

detail: skip(count) count - The number of results to skip
documentation:
Skips count number of results. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.skip-count)

Skips initial lookup access control checks. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.skipacl-bool-true)

detail: sort(object) object - an object containing indexed, sortable properties to sort on and their direction (1, -1)
documentation:
Sets the sort options (e.g. {c_num_prescriptions: -1, c_fullname: 1}). 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.sort-object)

text: stream((result, total) => { return false; }, (result) => { return result; })
detail: stream(fnEach, fnMap) fnEach - called after each item is written, fnMap - called to transform each result before output
documentation:
Exhausts the cursor, setting the content type to application/json and writing directly to the Response as a list object. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.stream-fneach-fnmap)

Overwrites the initial filter passed in the constructor. 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.where-filter)

Exhausts the cursor and returns an array of results (not a list! see toList() ). 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.toarray)

Returns a list object based on limit() (or the default limit of 10). 
 #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/cursors#querycursor.tolist)
